decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (WAV/01, WAV/11, WAV/03, WAV/04, WAV/02, received 02/08/2013, Unnumbered Flood Risk Assessment, received 19/08/2013, WAV/05 Revision P1, WAV/09 Revision P1, WAV/10 Revision P1, WAV/08 Revision P1, WAV/06 Revision P1, WAV/07 Revision P1, received 11/10/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey side infill extension to the rear of the house
